description: {"blocks":[{"key":"cgbl9","text":"This protocol presents the procedures to estimate the concentration of cells' suspensions using an hemocytometer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer:

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"3pun5","text":"The lower limit for accurate counting of cells in a hemocytometer is usually considered to be 2.5 x 105/ml. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":94,"length":13},{"style":"sup","offset":102,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2pm14","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dkbf","text":"For cell numbers greater than 2.5 x 106/ml, it is generally recommended that the sample be diluted.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":14},{"style":"sup","offset":38,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2mqcj","text":"Wash the hemocytometer with a washer bottle and dry it using a paper towel","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1o525","text":"Cover the hemocytometer with the coverslip and place it on a flat surface ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"evqgq","text":"Vortex briefly the cell suspension whose concentration will be calculated","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fosrm","text":"Using a micropipette collect 10-100 µl of the previously agitated suspension","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6655f","text":"Place the micropipette tip on the hemocytometer edge near the coverslip","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ph18","text":"Empty the spore suspension slowly into the chamber of the hemocytometer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"hn84","text":"Place the hemocytometer in the microscope's mechanical stage and secure it using the stage clip","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4ilng","text":"Turn on the microscope and focus on the hemocytometer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"49uha","text":"Look out for the first square to be counted","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4rp1i","text":"Count the number of cells on each square","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"49p2u","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"d9t39","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6uteq","text":"If the cells are touching the upper or the left lines of the square, cells are to be counted, but if they are touching the lower or right line they should not be counted","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"349t4","text":"Count all the squares following a zig-zag ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"hrtf","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"15l2c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"result","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":0}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"a9kl5","text":"  ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6keq3","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"guid":"B73DA2905D4111ECB15183C38F9728E1","height":217,"id":193006,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f6rsbpqqx.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f6rqbpqqx.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f6rrbpqqx.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f6rpbpqqx.webp","width":238},"mutability":"","type":"image"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cgato","text":"Write down the number of cells on each square","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3mstl","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"en4pv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fk157","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"16shk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":108,"offset":0,"style":"italic"},{"length":13,"offset":94,"style":"bold"},{"length":1,"offset":102,"style":"sup"}],"key":"a49v1","text":"The lower limit for accurate counting of cells in a hemocytometer is usually considered to be 2.5 x 105/ml. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4e8p","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":99,"offset":0,"style":"italic"},{"length":14,"offset":29,"style":"bold"},{"length":1,"offset":38,"style":"sup"}],"key":"7nt5e","text":"For cell numbers greater than 2.5 x 106/ml, it is generally recommended that the sample be diluted.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":107,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"bp124","text":"Count the number of cells on at least five squares. Ideally, repeat the procedure twice for higher accuracy","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"103rn","text":"Estimation of the concentration","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"es93f","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"5ipd6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":70,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"fkbkk","text":"According to the cell's size cells can be counted on squares 1, 2 or 3","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":0}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6sq5n","text":"  ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9n7ql","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"guid":"127031505D4211ECB15183C38F9728E1","height":400,"id":193010,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f6rwbpqqx.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f6rubpqqx.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f6rvbpqqx.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f6rtbpqqx.webp","width":550},"mutability":"","type":"image"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"taqn","text":"If cells were counted on squares of size 1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a5khd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b1690","text":"Concentration (cells/ml)= Number of counted cells*10,000/Number of squares counted","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"94arh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8klem","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"pgdh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":76,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"dr0l3","text":"If the cells' suspension has been diluted the formula should be adjusted to:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3j62i","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":91,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"3036f","text":"Concentration (cells/ml)= Number of counted cells*10,000/Number of squares counted*dilution","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c4bt6","text":"If cells were counted on squares of size 2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1uo3v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a0m7n","text":"Concentration (cells/ml)= Number of counted cells*160,000/Number of squares counted","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"s6or","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"2qtso","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9o07a","text":"If the cells' suspension has been diluted the formula should be adjusted to:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"f9m72","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6tona","text":"Concentration (cells/ml)= Number of counted cells*160,000/Number of squares counted*dilution","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4lbo7","text":"If cells were counted on squares of size 3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"67m3t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9ngmm","text":"Concentration (cells/ml)= Number of counted cells*250,000/Number of squares counted","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5ik5e","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"43hug","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"arl8s","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"3aics","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":25,"offset":44,"style":"italic"}],"key":"7tq02","text":"This square size is typically used to count Plasmodiophora brassicae resting spores","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3cbqn","text":"If the cells' suspension has been diluted the formula should be adjusted to:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8737c","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5hb97","text":"Concentration (cells/ml)= Number of counted cells*250,000/Number of squares counted*dilution","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
